channel.title: What is the most requested type of server at the moment?
channel.description:
Hi I am working on developing a server, and I would just like to know what people are most interested in?
Examples: PvP, Skilling, Gambling, etc.
Also what are some other interests?

item.title: What is the most requested type of server at the moment?
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

The type of Servers which are doing things nobody else is.

Examples:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Read full topic
item.source: What is the most requested type of server at the moment?

item.title: What is the most requested type of server at the moment?
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

The most requested server is the one that YOU want to work on. The one that you enjoy developing yourself. It doesn’t matter what it’s features are, as long as your players can have fun and you’re enjoying the experience along with it.

At least, that’s what I think programming and private servers should be like.

Read full topic
item.source: What is the most requested type of server at the moment?
